products.name: Basic T-Shirt
products.description: A comfortable cotton t-shirt for everyday wear.
products.productDescription: A classic Basic T-Shirt crafted from the finest cotton, this shirt offers unmatched breathability and comfort for everyday wear. With a relaxed fit, it’s perfect for layering or as a stand-alone piece for casual outings.

additionalInformation.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low, iron on reverse

products.name: Slim Fit Jeans
products.description: Stylish slim fit jeans made from high-quality denim.
products.productDescription: These Slim Fit Jeans are tailored with high-quality denim and a touch of stretch to provide flexibility without compromising on the sleek look. They complement all body types and are designed for comfort, style, and durability.

additionalInformation.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold with similar colors, avoid bleach

products.name: Running Shoes
products.description: Lightweight running shoes with excellent cushioning.
products.productDescription: Engineered for runners, these shoes feature lightweight cushioning and a breathable upper to keep your feet cool and supported. Perfect for both long runs and casual wear, they bring style and comfort to your stride.

additionalInformation.Material: Mesh and synthetic upper, rubber sole
additionalInformation.Care Instructions: Spot clean only with mild soap

products.name: Leather Jacket
products.description: A premium leather jacket with a modern fit.
products.productDescription: Crafted from premium leather, this jacket adds a timeless edge to your wardrobe. With a modern, slim fit, it pairs well with both casual and formal outfits, providing a versatile option for all occasions.

products.name: Classic Watch
products.description: A timeless wristwatch with a stainless steel strap.
products.productDescription: This Classic Watch combines functionality with timeless style. Featuring a stainless steel strap and quartz movement, it is the ideal accessory for everyday elegance.

products.name: Sunglasses
products.description: Stylish sunglasses with UV protection lenses.

additionalInformation.Care Instructions: Wipe clean with a soft cloth

products.name: Denim Jacket
products.description: Classic denim jacket with a classic fit.
products.productDescription: A timeless denim jacket that adds a layer of style to any outfit. Made with durable denim and a soft inner lining, it is suitable for year-round wear and easy layering.

additionalInformation.Care Instructions: Machine wash warm with like colors

products.name: Leather Wallet
products.description: A classic leather wallet with multiple card slots.
products.productDescription: This leather wallet offers a refined, slim profile with multiple card slots and a durable build. Ideal for those who prefer a minimalist yet functional design.

additionalInformation.Care Instructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth

products.name: Leather Backpack
products.description: A classic leather backpack with multiple compartments.
products.productDescription: An elegant leather backpack that combines style with functionality. With multiple compartments, it’s perfect for organizing daily essentials and adds a sophisticated touch to your look.

products.name: Casual Shirt
products.description: A light and comfortable shirt perfect for casual wear.
products.productDescription: This minimalist leather wallet is designed to fit easily into your pocket while holding all essential cards and cash. Durable and elegant, it’s a must-have accessory for everyday use.

additionalInformation.Care Instructions: Apply leather conditioner to maintain suppleness

products.name: Leather Backpack
products.description: A classic leather backpack with multiple compartments.
products.productDescription: A versatile leather backpack with classic styling. Ideal for both professional and casual settings, it is built to last and offers ample storage for daily essentials.

additionalInformation.Care Instructions: Avoid exposure to water; apply conditioner periodically

products.name: Leather Wallet
products.description: A classic leather wallet with multiple card slots.
products.productDescription: Designed with both form and function in mind, this leather wallet is perfect for those who value simplicity without sacrificing style. It’s compact, durable, and refined.

additionalInformation.Care Instructions: Wipe clean with dry cloth, avoid direct sunlight

products.name: Leather Backpack
products.description: A classic leather backpack with multiple compartments.
products.productDescription: This premium leather backpack combines luxury with practicality, featuring compartments for tech and other essentials. Perfect for commuters and travelers alike.

products.name: Leather Wallet
products.description: A classic leather wallet with multiple card slots.
products.productDescription: A sleek, compact leather wallet for the modern minimalist. With ample card slots and a secure design, it fits comfortably in any pocket without added bulk.

products.name: Leather Backpack
products.description: A classic leather backpack with multiple compartments.
products.productDescription: Made from high-quality leather, this backpack is perfect for carrying essentials with a touch of sophistication. Features padded shoulder straps for added comfort.
